tasks.label: Launch Processor Node
tasks.command: bash -c 'chmod +x ${workspaceFolder}/install/local_setup.bash && source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source ${workspaceFolder}/install/local_setup.bash && ros2 run processor processor --ros-args --params-file ${workspaceFolder}/install/processor/share/processor/config/processor.param.yaml'

tasks.label: Launch Dataloader Node
tasks.command: bash -c 'chmod +x ${workspaceFolder}/install/local_setup.bash && source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source ${workspaceFolder}/install/local_setup.bash && ros2 run dataloader dataloader --ros-args --params-file ${workspaceFolder}/install/dataloader/share/dataloader/config/dataloader.param.yaml'

tasks.label: Launch RViz2
tasks.command: bash -c 'chmod +x ${workspaceFolder}/install/local_setup.bash && source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source ${workspaceFolder}/install/local_setup.bash && ros2 run rviz2 rviz2 --display-config ${workspaceFolder}/src/rviz2_config/config/rviz2_config.rviz'

tasks.label: Launch ROS2 Node with GDB
tasks.command: chmod +x ${workspaceFolder}/install/local_setup.bash && source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source ${workspaceFolder}/install/local_setup.bash && ros2 run --prefix 'gdb -ex run --args' ${input:packageName} ${input:packageName} --ros-args --params-file ${workspaceFolder}/install/${input:packageName}/share/${input:packageName}/config/${input:packageName}.param.yaml
